description: Take the stress out of midweek dinner with this easy frittata recipe packed with verdant kale and juicy tomatoes. Plus, it only takes 30 minutes to whip up.
keywords: Frittata,Quick & easy dinner,Kale,Healthier Easier,Jan Feb 2022,Tomato,Weeknight dinner,Summer
name: Summer Tomato, Kale & Basil Frittata Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 bunch kale, leaves picked and torn, stems finely chopped
4 Woolworths 7 seeds & grains hi fibre low gi loaf, thin,toasted, halved

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Heat half of the oil in a medium cast-iron or ovenproof frying pan. Cook onion and kale for 3 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened. Stir in Solanato tomatoes.

Meanwhile, place eggs and milk in a large jug and whisk to combine. Season with pepper. Pour egg mixture over onion mixture and cook for 2 minutes or until egg starts to set around edges. Top with truss tomatoes. Transfer to oven and bake for 15 minutes or until set.
Place salad leaves, vinegar and remaining oil in a bowl and toss to coat. Top frittata with basil. Serve with salad and bread.
